#Text=Cegléd
#Text=Cegléd ( nicknamed " the gate of the Great Plain " ) is a city in Pest county , approximately 70 km southeast of Budapest .

column1: #Text=Cegléd is situated between the Duna and Tisza rivers , north of Kiskunság , at the western part of the Great Hungarian Plain .
#Text=By bus
#Text=Cegléd Bus Station ( Cegléd autóbusz-állomás ) , Cegléd , Mozdony u. 6 . ( Close to train station ) , ☏ +3653310605 .
#Text=Cash desk opening hours : Workdays : 06:30 – 14:30 , 1st to 6th day of each month : 06:15 – 16 . :15 .
#Text=Local lines on map ( PDF ) .
#Text=Interurban Lines destinations include : Abony ( E ) , Csemő ( SW ) , Lajosmizse ( SW ) , Tápiószőlős ( N ) , Tápiószentmárton ( N ) , Tápióbicske ( N ) , Nagykáta , Szolnok .

#Text=Long distance lines that pass Cegléd are : Budapest – Szolnok – Szeghalom – Komádi/ Gyula , Eger – Kecskemét – Kalocsa , Gyöngyös – Heves – Jászberény – Kecskemét , Miskolc – Mezőkövesd – Jászberény- Újszász – Kecskemét , Szolnok – Nagykőrös .
#Text=By train
#Text=Cegléd Railway Station ( Cegléd Vasúti állomás ) , Mozdony utca ( North of Downtown ) , ☏ +3653311024 .
#Text=Hourly direct train connection with Budapest via Monor and Szolnok via Abony .
#Text=Infrequently with Kecskemét via Nagykőrös .
#Text=To Nyíregyháza also regularly departing trains .
#Text=Get around

#Text=Tourinform - Cegléd , Cegléd , Kossuth tér 1 ( In Town Hall building ) , ☏ +3653500285 , fax : +3653500286 , ✉ cegled@tourinform.hu . mid-June-Aug : M - F 08:00 - 16:00 , Sa 09:00 - 14:00 ; Sep-mid-Jun : M - F 08:00 - 16:00 , Sa Su closed .
#Text=Tourist information office of Cegléd .
#Text=Up to date info about sights , accommodations , services .
#Text=Free maps leaflets .
#Text=Buy some souvenirs .
#Text=Organize tours , bookings .
#Text=Spoken languages : English , German .
#Text=Churches
#Text=Evangelical Church ( Evangelikus templom ) , Szabadság tér ( East of Reformed Church ) , ☏ +3653317886 , +36 20 8242881 , fax : +3653500735 , ✉ cegled@lutheran.hu .
#Text=This Neo-Gothic church was built in 1895-96 .
#Text=The main bell of the church is 600 kg .
#Text=Admission : free of charge .
#Text=Reformed Church ( Ceglédi Nagytemplom , Református templom ) , Szabadság tér 1-3 ( In the Downtown ) , ☏ +3653311340 , fax : +3653311340 , ✉ ceglednagytemplom.ref@gmail.com .
#Text=Hungarian and English tours by booking .
#Text=Designed by József Hild , built in 1835-1870 , the biggest Calvinist church in Central Europe .
#Text=The dome was destroyed in a fire in 1936 and rebuilt in a taller form .
#Text=The church building is a symbol of the town .
#Text=The twin-towered façade has a projecting porch with a tympanum supported by four Ionic columns .
#Text=The frieze below the tympanum bears the inscription : " Come unto me all of you " .
#Text=Chapel church of Our Lady of Hungarians ( Magyarok Nagyasszonya kápolnatemplom ) , Széchenyi utca 87 ( Széchenyi street cemetery ) , ☏ +3653311144 .
#Text=By appointment .
#Text=Designed in unique Modern style .
#Text=The red roof , the white walls and beautiful green lawn symbolize the colors of the Hungarian national flag .
#Text=Admission : free of charge .
#Text=Holy Cross Parish Church ( Szent Kereszt Plébániatemplom ) , Kossuth Lajos tér 3 . ( Close to the Town Hall ) , ☏ +3653500950 , ✉ cegled.plebania@gmail.com .
#Text=A Saint Anne chapel stood on the site in the 14th and 15th centuries .
#Text=Today 's church was erected on the site of a Gothic church demolished in 1821 .
#Text=The main altar was built in 1830 .
#Text=An artist of Pest ( now Budapest ) did the painting of the Calvary scene on the main altar .
#Text=Admission : free of charge .
#Text=Museums
#Text=Drum Museum ( Dobmúzeum ) , Szabdság tér 5 ( Cose to Evangelical Church ) , ☏ +3653321068 , fax : +3653321068 , ✉ info@drummuseum.hu .
#Text=Opening hours : M - F 10:00 - 16:00 , weekend by booking . shows the history of jazz drumming from the turn of the century to the present day .
#Text=Instrument catalogues , music books , scores , concert and teaching videos , audio material , photo archive .
#Text=Percussion instruments for visitors to try out in a music room .
#Text=Duo Gallery ( Duo Galéria ) , Szabadság tér 8 ( Opposite the Reformed church ) , ☏ +36705824444 , ✉ info@duogaleria.hu .
#Text=This is an exhibition hall of a private collector .
#Text=The collection include the contemporary art , the antiquities and paintings . free .
#Text=Kossuth Museum ( Kossuth Múzeum [ ˈkoʃuːt ] . ) , Múzeum utca 5 ( One block north of Szabadság square ) , ☏ +3653321904 , ✉ kossuthmuzeum@pmmi.hu .
#Text=The main museum of the city .
#Text=Local history and local ethnography covering 4000 BC to 1946 AD .
#Text=Selection from the Kossuth Relic Collection , Lajos Kossuth was a Hungarian lawyer , journalist , politician and Regent-President of the Kingdom of Hungary during the revolution of 1848 – 49 .
#Text=Adults/reduced : Ft1000/500 ( 2014 ) .
#Text=Museum the History of Education and Religious art ( Iskolatörténeti és Egyházművészeti Múzeum ) , Cegléd , Szív u. 1 . ( In the Reformed school ) , ☏ +3653311963 .
#Text=Sep to mid-June : M - F 08:00 - 16:00 , guide by booking . temporary exhibitions .
#Text=Sport Historical Collection ( Városi Sporttörténeti Gyűjtemény ) , Cegléd , Gubody utca 9 . ( Behind Main Post Office ) , ☏ +3653316930 , ✉ sporttort@fibermail.hu .
#Text=Th , Tu:14:00 - 18:00 , to guide tours reservation required .
#Text=Contains more than 10,000 documents on the town 's rich sports life and presents them to the public in its exhibitions .
#Text=In addition to the valuable specialised library , the archive and collection of photographs , the visitor can admire the trophies of such great Hungarian sportspersons
#Text=Stove Museum ( Öntöttvaskályha - gyűjtemény ) , Dessewffy u 70 . ( South of Downtown , between Nyár street and Forgách street ) , ☏ +3653315638 ( evenings ) , ✉ info@ontottvaskalyha.hu .
#Text=Opening hours : by booking .
#Text=Cast-iron stoves from the 19th century .
#Text=Stoves and other items over 100 years old such as irons , a variety of scales , weights , mortars , pans , tarkedli ovens and fireplaces .
#Text=Old-timer Vehicle Exhibition ( Veterán Jármű Szalon ) , Külső Kátai út 1 ( 100m north of the rail ) , ☏ +36704096236 , ✉ iroda@veteranszalon.hu .
#Text=Saturdays : 09:00 - 12:00 .
#Text=Presents vintage cars and motorcycles .

#Text=Turf bog nature conservation area ( Tőzegláp , Ceglédi-rét Természetvédelmi terület ) , Mályva street ( Between Cegléd and Csemő along the Creek Gerje . ) , ☏ +3653500285 . with rare animal and plant species .
#Text=The wetland formed mining and drainage , but the resulting ponds with diverse wildlife .
#Text=The largest botanical value is the patches of peat moss . free .
#Text=Lick lakes nature conservation area ( Ceglédi Szikes tavak ) ( Nearby ( north ) of Cegléd .
#Text=Between Hwy #4 and Road #311 ) , ☏ +3653500285 . with magnificent wilderness scenery .
#Text=Salt marshes , intermittent water-covered meadows and pastures .
#Text=Flora and fauna specials : saline aster , the Hungarian statice , Ophrys sphegodes , lapwing , the tailed Godwit , redshank , avocet and winged Stilt .
#Text=Fine place to walking , birdwatching and relaxing free .
#Text=Town Hall ( Városháza ) , Kossuth tér 1 ( Downtown ) , ☏ +3653500285 , fax : +3653500286 , ✉ cegled@tourinform.hu .
#Text=This is an imposing two-storey building with a central projection topped with a two-planed roof and a small rounded dome and prominent corner .
#Text=It was erected in 1891-93 in eclectic style .
#Text=The Town Hall was designed by two architects Budapest .
#Text=Tree of Liberty ( Szabadság fája ) ( In the Church garden , corner of Kazinczy and Ősz streets ) , ☏ +3653311340 . made by a local ceramic artist , belfry has been over it .
#Text=There are seven ceramic bell with numbers on the side .
#Text=These are indicate the important events of Hungarian history .
